title: RUMC: A Rule-based Classifier Inspired by Evolutionary Methods
abstract:
As the field of data analysis grows rapidly due to the large amounts of data
being generated, effective data classification has become increasingly
important. This paper introduces the RUle Mutation Classifier (RUMC), which
represents a significant improvement over the Rule Aggregation ClassifiER
(RACER). RUMC uses innovative rule mutation techniques based on evolutionary
methods to improve classification accuracy. In tests with forty datasets from
OpenML and the UCI Machine Learning Repository, RUMC consistently outperformed
twenty other well-known classifiers, demonstrating its ability to uncover
valuable insights from complex data.
